name: smart-laundry-backend
description: Django REST API backend for Smart Laundry with npm run scripts

scripts.setup: bash -lc 'python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.seed: bash -lc 'source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py populate_services && python manage.py populate_core_data'
